title: Armor + AD item (assassins instagiving adcs)
body: I feel in some ways armor pen or lethality now on assassins can get out of control, and especially because ad carries that don't want to give up the damage When building a defensive item to protect themselves. I think that there might be a chance for an item that can supply a moderate amount of ad (not sure about numbers) that also can supply some armor, but at the same time I feel that amount  armor wouldn't be able to do much for a carry when most ad assassins stack lethality  anyway, just a little idea though. or maybe something like hexdinker/maw but works against physical damage instead.

replies.body:
Oh fuck no.
If you died to an assassin in the complete garbage state they are now, you are horrible and deserved it.
Back in my days , ADC bought Guardian angel and no one complained
carries shouldn't be roaming alone and need to stick to the back line.

We already have an AD+AR item in the form of Deadman's Plate and odds are good that we wont see anything like that for a Marksman.  Anything a marksman could easily use like that would simply turn into another 'must buy' and hurt the situation far more than help.
